description: This is a storyline update where a beautiful woman's darkest fantasy becomes a reality. Beverly Hills picks up a guy at the bar and goes back to his place to get fucked. She wakes up the next morning to find herself blindfolded, gagged and strapped to a kinky electric chair in a basement laboratory. The mad scientist, James Deen, conducts perverted experiments on her such as sending electric currents through her pussy, making her squirt from orgasms, fucking her ass in tough restraints and inflicting pain by use of cane, paddles and clamps.
title: Mad Scientist
